explains: n. （宗教）布道；（道德）说教；陈词滥调

sentences.en: She delivered a homily on the virtues of family life.
sentences.cn: 她进行了一场家庭生活美德方面的说教。

sentences.en: She gave us a little homily about family values.
sentences.cn: 她就家庭价值问题对我们进行了一些说教。

sentences.en: He launched into a homily on family relationships.
sentences.cn: 他开始就家庭关系进行说教。
